purpose: The email provides details about the IEEE iMETA 2025 conference, including its purpose, tracks, workshops, and important dates for submissions.
evidence_sentences: The International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA) is to bring together leading researchers, academics, and industry experts to explore the various aspects of the distributive metaverse, including its technologies, applications, and implications for various industries.
Overall, the iMETA conference aims to provide attendees with a comprehensive understanding of the communication, computing, and system requirements of the metaverse.
IEEE is a technical sponsor of iMETA 2025.
